title: Collision Issue With Hand/Nozzle in VRC 3

content.raw:
I have seen issues with collision detection between the hand and the hose.  It seems that the hand passes through the model, I'm not sure if a specific action instantiates it, other than grasping, but I'll try to reproduce it.  If I do I'll edit this post/reply with more info.

Here is an image of what I am talking about.

![Hand_Hose Collision Issue](https://www.theroboticschallenge.org/_SiteImages/Discussions/Issue_HoseCollision_1.jpg)
